name: Lords of the Fallen: Ancient Labyrinth
name_original: Lords of the Fallen: Ancient Labyrinth
description:
Lords of the Fallen: Ancient Labyrinth is an action-RPG game developed by City Interactive. It was originally released in 2015. CI Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Lords of the Fallen: Ancient Labyrinth on Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Xbox Store and Steam.
